install.name: K2 content integration for AcyMailing
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2016 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
install.description: This AcyMailing plugin enables you to include k2 articles in AcyMailing

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: wordwrap
param.label: Intro Word Wrapping
param.description: If you insert only the introduction and you didn't insert the read more link, AcyMailing will only load the first XX characters of your content. If you specify 0, AcyMailing won't wrap your content

param.name: displayart
param.label: Display articles
param.description: Select if you want to display all articles in the popup for article selection or only published articles
param.option: Only articles created by the currently logged in user

param.name: contentaccess
param.label: Content Access
param.description: If you use the automatic K2 element insertion (via the categories tab), AcyMailing will only include items having the selected access in your Newsletter

param.name: itemid
param.label: Default Itemid
param.description: ID of the menu attached to K2
